bibl.title: Greek Ostraca from Egypt.

series.title: Transactions and Proceedings of the American Philological Association
TAPA

bibl.note: Édition d'une collection de 16 ostraca offerte par T.C. Skeat à l'University of Michigan. - Nos 1-10. Accounts and Receipts. 3rd cent. B.C. - 5th cent. A.D. - No. 12. A Letter. Late 2nd / early 3rd cent. A.D. - No. 13. A Lyric Fragment [= Pack2 1947]. Late 1st or early 2nd cent. A.D. - Nos 14-16. Christian Hymns [= van Haelst 827-829]. 6th or 7th cent.
